data: Staged pinch of Kr liner profile obtained from experimental measurement.

! 01 - 1D w/ sesame tables
! 02 - max diff set to limit tdiff using 20 microns
! 03 - etamax 6.0e3 throughout

name: contrl
description:
! Simple Z-Pinch test case using PBFZ refurbished class machine.
! ideal MHD

parameters.name: dtstopr
parameters.description: minimum time step, stop if dt < (dtstopr * t)
